thread.title: Avalon Oil & Gas, Inc. Announces Corporate Name Change to Groove Botanicals, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: Avalon Oil & Gas, Inc. Announces Corporate Name Change to Groove Botanicals, Inc.
text:
MINNEAPOLIS, May 14, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Avalon Oil and Gas, Inc. (Avalon) (OTCQB:AOGN) today announced a corporate name change to ‘Groove Botanicals, Inc.’. The Company’s new ticker symbol is GRVE. The Market Effective Date of these changes is Monday, May 14 th , 2018. These changes were made to reflect Avalon’s new business operations as a consumer health products company dedicated to improving health and well-being.
Kent Rodriguez, CEO of Avalon Oil and Gas, Inc., commented: “We are very pleased to announce the corporate name change to Groove Botanicals, Inc., and represents the Company’s new corporate direction as a business dedicated to developing innovative consumer products that optimize human health. Groove’s products contain premium hemp extracts and feature a broad range of cannabinoids (CBD). The Company plans on creating a portfolio of assets via royalty agreements, equity investments, licensing agreements and developing our own proprietary innovative CB3-based skin care products. We look forward to announcing further developments in the coming months as we expand and develop these innovative new business and product lines,” concluded Mr. Rodriguez.
